07 n. 01   ἐπιτρίβω add ed.pr. : επιτριω P
contents: list of 8 Greek verbs; in ll. 1-4 the verbs start with the letter ?, but for the other lines there does not seem to be any system in the choice of the verbs (two starting with ?, one with ? and one with ?).
statepreservation: a single wooden tablet (5.3 x 10.2 cm; 0.6 cm thick); there are no holes drilled through the wood, so probably it was always meant to be used as a single item; contains 8 words, written across the short dimension, in a single column in the left hand upper corner of the tablet, each word being written on another line; there is an upper margin of ca. 0.5 cm; underneath line 8 there is a margin of 5.5 cm; the words are preceded by a left-hand margin of 0.3-0.4 cm; after the individual lines there is a space of 3.3-2.7 cm
lectionalsigns: orthographic mistake: perhaps omission of ? in l. 7; paragraphos
hand: medium-sized, roughly bilinear, letters often linked, leaning forward, written by a fairly well-trained hand, perhaps a teacher's, though some letters are rather irregularly formed
